title: Tsuma Netori Rei: Boku no Ayamachi Kanojo no Sentaku

synonyms: Tsuma Netori Zero: My Mistake, Her Choice
alternative_titles.ja: 妻ネトリ 零 ～僕の過ち 彼女の選択～

synopsis: Takafumi, a man who works as a chef in the school cafeteria, is married to Makoto, a female sports teacher at the school where he works. During their marriage, Makoto had never felt the pleasure and climax of having sex with her husband, Takafumi, because her husband's penis was small and he always ejaculated prematurely. Until finally one day Makoto was trapped by one of the old male teachers, he was drugged and then raped. Since then, Makoto's attitude begins to change towards her husband Takafumi, and Takafumi tries to find out what has happened to his wife...
